message.entry: Matrix C must be the same size as Z.
The lengths of X and Y must match the size of Z.
The length of X must match the number of columns of Z.
The length of Y must match the number of rows of Z.
X and Y must both be vectors or both be matrices.
Matrices X and Y must be the same size as Z.
When Z is a vector, X and Y must also be vectors.
X and Y must be same length as Z or the lengths of X and Y must match the size of Z.
XI and YI must be the same size or vectors of different orientations.
